title: Eukaryotic Memory Architecture Principles
description: The Subject-Object Git system and the Google Drive synchronization layer.

principles.subject_object_duality: Subject repos contain versioned logic; Object repos contain subjects. This creates a fractal, decentralized hierarchy.
principles.eukaryotic_sync: Big files and high-entropy blobs are stored via Google Drive layer to maintain Git low-latency.
principles.context_entry: Each repo must have a README.ai providing context on its type (Subject/Object) and sync status.
